CustomField.formula:
If (
OR ( ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Won')), ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Cancelled by Customer')), ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Withdrawn by Nokia')), ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Lost to Competitor')) ),
Unweighted_Amount_EUR__c,0 )
CustomField.label: Total Decided Value EUR
